plot: A crazy couple kidnaps a young girl for ransom. The man develops an upside-down Stockholm Syndrome with the hostage, and soon he is torn between his manic wife, fantasies of the hostage and his very own troubled mind.
title: Latrodectus
plot_es: A crazy couple kidnaps a young girl for ransom. The man develops an upside-down Stockholm Syndrome with the hostage, and soon he is torn between his manic wife, fantasies of the hostage and his very own troubled mind.
